item.title: The real tutorial for Galileo Gen 2 Board
item.description: Some of the tutorials on the internet are outdated, and cause a lot of problems to start on the develop of the Galileo Gen 2 Board, to solve this, we will explain what you'll need to do to make the best setup possible.
